title: Tired of Streaming? Home-Grown 'Free Blockbuster' Libraries Are Trying to O
excerpt: In 2019 Los Angeles film/TV producer Brian Morrison painted Blockbuster's logo onto an old newspaper box — and then filled it up with used DVDs.  "The Free Blockbuster movement slowly gained traction," reports the New York Times — aided at times by social media —  "and eventually m...
